title: AI Coaching V2: The Next Generation of Sales Intelligence
excerpt: We're excited to announce AI Coaching V2, our most advanced sales intelligence platform yet. With enhanced real-time analysis, predictive insights, and personalized coaching, V2 represents a quantum leap in AI-powered sales performance.

content.content: Today, we're thrilled to announce AI Coaching V2, the most advanced sales intelligence platform we've ever built. After analyzing millions of sales conversations and learning from thousands of sales teams, we've created something that goes beyond coaching - it's a complete sales intelligence system.
What's New in V2
AI Coaching V2 introduces breakthrough features that transform how sales teams operate:

content.title: Enhanced Real-Time Analysis
content.description: Sub-50ms processing with multi-modal analysis including voice tone, sentiment, and intent detection.

content.description: AI that predicts what buyers will say next and prepares perfect responses in advance.

content.title: Personalized Learning
